boardgame.name: Marvel Heroes
Marvel Heroes Brettspiel
boardgame.description: Marvel Heroes is a game set in the Marvel Universe for 2 to 4 players, with plenty of opportunities for cooperation and competition between the Super Heroes controlled by the players. Players take control of a group of Super Heroes (X-Men, Fantastic Four, Marvel Knights or the Avengers) as well as the Nemesis of one of the other player's group (Magneto, Dr. Doom, Kingpin or Red Skull). During the game, each player finds allies, enemies and power-ups, and face the menacing Super Villains controlled by the other players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;High-quality plastic figures of many of the major Marvel Super Heroes, including Spider-Man, The Fantastic Four and The X-Men, as well as of the Nemesis characters, are included in the game. Each character featured in the game is represented by a detailed 40 mm plastic figure and an accompanying character card describing the character's special abilities. Power-ups can be added with special effects, which are different depending on who is acquiring these bonus items, so that all the different incarnations of the character can be played._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

never used +++++ english version ++++++++++ will be shipped insured +++++ international payment : paypal OR direct bank to bank transfer (wich is cost-free inside european union by the way) OR cash (in a registered letter, exchanged into euros already) +++++ payment for germany : paypal OR personal pick up in berlin OR direct bank to bank transfer +++++ for all : no checks ! ++++++++++ international buyers beware : though german postal is relatively fast, they sadly aren´t cheap. it costs bewteen 19 - 37 euros for parcels up to a weight of 5 kg (= about 4 big boxed boardgames). price depends on where the package has to be shipped, so please ask for prices, before you hit the buy button ! +++++ insured shipment inside germany costs 8 euros

Do look at my other games for sale to see if a bundle could save you some shipping costs.

[b]Condition:[/b] Contents/box in good condition. EXCEPTION: Boards for this game were notorious for warping. Years ago I tried back-bending the board and it snapped at one of the seams. So, I took a razor blade and cut along all of the seams, then lined them up and re-attached each section with clear packing tape. (See picture.) Game is actually playable now, but the board is held together with tape. [b]Photo:[/b] [ImageID=3295697] [ImageID=3295699] [b]Shipping Options:[/b] I will check all three of USPS, UPS, and FedEx to find the cheapest option. Experience has made it clear that there is no one-size fits all shipping solution and each carrier has different favorable price points depending on weight, dimensions, and distance. Not all options will be available, but may include: USPS Priority (East Coast) USPS Retail Ground (Midwest and West Coast) USPS Regional Rate (If your order fits the standardized box) USPS First Class (Under 13 oz) UPS Ground FedEx Home FedEx Ground (commercial addresses only)

This listing is for a used copy of Marvel Heroes in good condition. The box bottom has a long tear in one end that does not appear to affect the box_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s structural integrity. The Daredevil mini was separated from the base when originally purchased but has been carefully reattached with professional modelling glue and the underneath paper backing is starting to separate from the base of the main board. The board also has the common fault associated with the manufacture of this game in that it does not automatically lie flat without something heavy (eg a pile of books) first being placed on it for a short while prior to playing (see photos). All reasonable offers will be considered. Buyer is responsible for all shipping costs that will depend on buyer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s location. Overseas shipping can cost a lot and will always be via airmail with delivery confirmation/tracking: please ask before buying. Buyer responsible for any and all Import/Customs charges. I can combine multiple purchases to reduce shipping costs where possible. Additional PayPal purchase fee (5%). No additional fee when funds sent direct in British pounds (e.g. sent not using a credit card as the source of funds in PayPal when using the family/friends option, personal cheque, bank wire transfer, cash, etc).
